features: How to install the sponge head: Aim at the groove, use your strength to insert the iron clamp on the sponge head into the groove. And if you want to remove the sponge head, pull the ring on the mop head out.
Sponge Mop Honeycomb Sponge: The mop has total 2 sponge heads in the box. Honeycombed sponge design is more absorbent, easier to dry and stronger breathability.
Sponge Mop Adjustable Iron Pole: The handle can be adjusted from 42.5 inch to 52 inch. Anticlockwise screw the middle pole to adjust the length of the mop to your desire.
Sponge Mop Water Squeegee: There is a squeegee that can help you to clean dirt and water in a easier and faster way.
Sponge Mop Removable Sponge: The sponge section can be easily removed and installed, and you can remove it for thorough cleaning or storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Didn't know there were really good mops out there, and very pleasantly surprised by this one. Solid, easy to assemble and use, and effectively wrings out the sponge, which is unusual. Also, the sponge itself is a good one, not the flimsy, light ones on most mops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: The mop was very easy to assemble. The mop's handle to operate the squeegee works very easily. It allows you to "wring out" the mop without touching the dirty sponge. It's also very lightweight. There is an attachment that allows you to either brush harder to remove dirt, or you can flip it over and use a squeegee push water. This is very handy. Overall, a very good mop and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A decent mop-- some design flaws
reviews.reviewText: This is a three star mop, but I am giving it four because it is decent, and these days even a decent mop is hard to find.My biggest question when reading the reviews was whether this would leave the floor too wet. I read someone say "streaky." IT absolutely does not leave the floor too wet, nor streaky. The sponge part of the mop does a great job leaving the floor as wet or as dry as you want, depending on the pressure you put on the mop head. It is a sponge, obviously, so if you press hard enough you can get it to leave water on the floor if you want to, but under normal pressure it will leave you with as nice an "almost dry floor" as you could want. Depending on the angle of the sponge this mop skips a bit on the pull-back stroke, which is fine, I guess. I think that most mop heads will require a precise technique if you want to avoid that.The size is good because while a little narrower than mops from decades past, this means that it fits into the top of standard round bucket pretty well. This size also doesn't really seem to affect the size of the task much, so overall the size is a benefit.My biggest gripe with this mop, is the location of the wring lever. I much prefer a ring lever closer to the top of the mop. The wring lever on this is quite low causing the user to have to bend over the bucket to wring it. Aside from the inconvenience of a sore back, there is also a greater risk to clothing damage if you are using a cleaner like bleach, due to close proximity of the mop and bucket to the upper torso when you wring it. I don't want a mop to require I wear special clothes and shower afterwards. I'd remove three stars for this, but given the lack of competition-- I didn't.Second is more of a concern than a flaw, the plastic tab that holds the mop head on is pretty thin. That aspect doesn't seem that sturdy to me, but so far the mop-head has stayed snug. I've mopped a 6x8 room about 10 times.Lastly, the pieces of the handle screw together, and inevitably they do loosen and have to be retightened every so often.Would I buy this again? Yes, but I would leave it in a heart-beat for something half-way decent with a lever closer to the top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mop works well and wrings the water out of the mop head better than any other mop I have had. Appears to be quality constructed with no issues so far. Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its plastic sponge not cellulose
reviews.reviewText: Its disappointing. The mop cleans well and the construction is solid. But the head is the cheap foam sponge not the more absorbent cellulose. It cant hold what water you put in it nor what it picks up without dripping. Like the difference between a sponge scrubby from target scotch brite or a 10-pak from 99¢ store. They molded it to look like cellulose too! But it isnt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mop you can buy!
reviews.reviewText: I was buying store bought mops every week cause they were cheap made and regular mopping destroyed then in a week or less. That should not happen! So I looked for me a commercial one and I found the best mop I've ever had! This does the job and then some. You will not be disappointed with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a good strong larger mop to clean the salt and snow off of my garage mats. This mop really did the trick. Stringer sponge than most and the brush and squeegee were an extra bonus. It was also easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointing, I really wanted to like this. Cannot understand all the + reviews?!
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2000 sqft house that is entirely tiled. I am not a professional house cleaner. I was looking for a mop that would clean the surface of the tile and all that sticks to it. If it got the grout clean too, that would be a bonus. This mop does neither! First of all the design is ridiculously flawed. The 3 piece handle continues to loosen as you use the mop, so you must stop what you are cleaning to tighten the pieces, or else the handle comes apart. Second, The mop head and added squeegee are not well thought out. Who designs these tools?? Look at the photos attached. You cannot clean a corner unless you take the squeegee off first otherwise you cannot get the mop into the corner. Third, IT DOESN'T CLEAN! I use a 2-bucket cleaning system. 1 bucket is plain water for rinsing the dirty mop off and 1 bucket is soapy for cleaning the floor. Many people have the same such system. After cleaning an area (approx 5'x5'), using my 2-bucket system, I noticed neither bucket of water was getting very "dirty". I let the floor dry for about 1 hour, then went back with my dreaded Swiffer Wet cloths. The floor was SO dirty. See the pictures attached. The mop did not clean the floor. Gross! I will be going back to my Swiffer cloths, which seem to be getting most of the dirt up (and can get into corners) until I find a better option. CAN NOT recommend this mop...

I actually bought this to clean my ceiling. It was getting a little dirty in some areas, and the handle on this mop is really long.The build quality is good, and the sponge is good. Overall a good mop. Hopefully they will be around long enough for me to still be able to get refills when I need them. Good thing it came with a spare.

Las partes del mango no son muy firmes, la esponja funciona razonablemente bien. La idea del cepillo integrado es buena. La uso para la limpieza diaria del baño y me resulta útil. Aún no la uso para limpieza profunda del piso pero funciona también para las paredes del baño. En general responde a las expectativas por su precio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Good mop hard to get replacement spongei
reviews.reviewText: Like the mop good sponge and great to have stiff bristles for those pesky stubborn marks .Am finding it hard to get sponges replaced so not sure it’s good value 2 sponges hat came with it are now defunct
Perfect quality, easy to use and fast shipping
A good buy, well worth the expense. Easy to use and maneuver. A powerful cleaner.
